long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a simple measuring bar to the WGT screen to help judge your putting speed. Also includes a putting distance calculator. This is purely for a SUGGESTED distance and is by no means a guarantee!
